children.name: Serverless
children.description: You don't see, provision server, someone manages server for you

children.name: We just implement the code
children.description: We leave more of the management of the architect and infrastructure to AWS

children.name: Concurency
children.description: The number of the lambda functions will be executed together

children.name: Retry
children.description: If lambdas async invocation fails, it will be retried

children.name: $LATEST version
children.description: Be a pointer to lastest using version

children.name: Also have v1, v2 version (Immutable) - can be accessed
children.description: When publish lambda function, we create a version
